summary: A small home with extensive outside camping area.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]UPDATE to v1.1:
[/size][/b]
fixed misaligned ceiling beams inside the house
the "curtain" downstairs is replaced by a door to get rid of the flapping fabric noise
small aesthetic changes to the interior furnishings and decorations
redesigned the Dibella altar to better match the surroundings
minor alignment fixes on the railings outside

optional no NPCs version is now available

files cleaned in TES5Edit
remember to remove your items from the containers before updating

[size=6][b]~~[/b][/size]

[size=4][i]Camp Riverwood[/i] edits the waterfall area located more or less half way between Riverwood and Whiterun. You are going to need the [i]Breezehome Key[/i] to open the fence gates and the door to the house (or simply use console for instant gratification).

[/size][b]~~[/b][size=4]
[/size]
[size=4]The mod adds a little, cottage-style home with [/size][size=4]a cozy fireplace:[/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/OgHZNCD.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=4]an extensive library (both upstairs and downstairs):[/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/ABSUIAQ.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=4]some basic storage:[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iWE6Zb0.jpg[/img]

[size=4]and a spacious bedroom that doubles as a mini-office:[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/f9DSzCq.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/rcJtP7I.jpg[/img]

[size=6][b]~~[/b][/size]

[size=4]The only purpose of the house, however, is to provide shelter in case of bad weather, because the real fun in this mod happens outside. There you will find an expansive, platformed camping site at your disposal:[/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/DYSaq2k.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=4] Apart from a cooking spit, alchemy table, blacksmith anvil and a safe container,
it also features [/size][size=4]a heated pool for the cold Skyrim nights (Frostfall compatible):[/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/fCkZuA4.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=4]There's a wood chopping block and a statue of Dibella with her shrine [/size]
[size=2](yes, I love Dibella, as those who use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54474/?]my previous mod[/url] already know)[/size][size=4]:[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7Qjb5Ao.jpg[/img]

[size=4] Last but not least, you get a huge natural swimming pool with a waterfall shower,[/size]
[size=4]because why use dwemer technology when you can have nature itself do all the work:[/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/uMEiuQi.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=4] There's also a mini pool-bar with a great view of Dragonsreach just over the flow of water,
a springboard for diving in style, a campfire to warm up by, and some idle markers for followers. [/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/VSz2hu2.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=6][b]~~[/b][/size]

[size=4]Four NPCs total are included in the mod. They will not offer dialogue or follow you, but three of them will keep your place warm and tidy while you are out adventuring in the world - each has a looped patrol route assigned that they will (usually) follow. [/size]

[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/GcRzHVD.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=4]Vulfrid takes care of the upper platform, he does the cooking and, occasionally, is being silly. He's quite the fabulous, albeit cowardly fellow. Findel and Noren reside on the lower platform, praising the goddess and keeping the fires stoked. Findel is a rather fierce lady, so you might want to be careful with her. Noren is a quiet guy who loves gazing into the distance from the springboard. [/size]

[size=4]Last but not least, the views are really breathtaking:[/size]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/pptQt5X.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=4]~~[/size]
[size=4]
Recommended texture replacer (as seen in the screenshots) is the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3417809/?tb=mods&pUp=1]sexy series by horrorview[/url].[/size][/center][size=4]
[/size]
author: Calarand
